channels.name: server-announcements
channels.description: Important updates, events, and changes related to the server

channels.name: introductions
channels.description: Introduce yourself to the cultural and creative industries community! Share your background and interests

channels.name: general-discussion
channels.description: Open discussions about anything related to cultural and creative industries

channels.name: industry-news
channels.description: Latest news, trends, and happenings in the cultural and creative industries

channels.name: visual-arts
channels.description: Discussions about painting, sculpture, photography, and other visual arts

channels.name: performing-arts
channels.description: Share and discuss information about theater, dance, music, and other performing arts

channels.name: literature
channels.description: Discussions about novels, poetry, storytelling, and other forms of creative writing

channels.name: heritage
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for preserving and promoting cultural heritage

channels.name: museums-and-galleries
channels.description: Discussions about the management and curation of museums and art galleries

channels.name: film-and-television
channels.description: Discussions about the production, distribution, and consumption of films and TV shows

channels.name: music-industry
channels.description: Share and discuss information about the music industry, including recording, publishing, and live performances

channels.name: gaming
channels.description: Discussions about the development, publishing, and playing of video games

channels.name: digital-media
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for creating and distributing digital content, such as podcasts and web series

channels.name: publishing
channels.description: Discussions about the publishing industry, including books, magazines, and digital publications

channels.name: graphic-design
channels.description: Discussions about branding, visual communication, and graphic design principles

channels.name: product-design
channels.description: Share and discuss information about the design and development of physical products

channels.name: fashion-design
channels.description: Discussions about fashion trends, textile design, and the fashion industry

channels.name: architecture
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for designing and constructing buildings and urban spaces

channels.name: interior-design
channels.description: Discussions about the design and decoration of interior spaces

channels.name: entrepreneurship
channels.description: Share and discuss information about cultural and creative industries events, conferences, and workshops

channels.name: job-opportunities
channels.description: Post and discuss job openings, internships, and collaboration opportunities in cultural and creative industries

channels.name: resource-sharing
channels.description: Share and exchange useful resources, tools, and materials for cultural and creative industries

channels.name: server-feedback
channels.description: Provide feedback and suggestions for improving the Cultural & Creative Industries Hub server

channels.name: server-rules
channels.description: Review and understand the server rules, guidelines, and code of conduct

channels.name: role-assignments
channels.description: Assign roles to users based on their interests, expertise, or specialization

channels.name: moderator-only
channels.description: Private channel for moderators to discuss server management, moderation, and community issues

channels.name: bot-commands
channels.description: Learn about and use bot commands for server management, moderation, and user engagement
